response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～怨念地縛霊～
response.overview: This documentary horror series has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites, and has over 80 titles in total! The series is full of bizarre and shocking images that are out of this world! This time's footage features the reflection of earthbound spirits that have been determined to have unresolved feelings and remain in place as vengeful spirits.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Cursed Spirits of Grudge and Earthbound Resentment
